---
title: "redis.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines settings for a Redis-based cache system. It specifies various parameters for connecting to and utilizing a Redis server as a backend for caching operations.

## Symbols

### `cache`
#### Description
The root configuration object for the caching system.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables the cache system
- Specifies Redis as the backend
- Sets a default Time-To-Live (TTL) for cached items
- Configures detailed Redis connection and behavior parameters

### `cache.enabled`
#### Description
A boolean flag to enable or disable the caching system.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | When set to true, the caching system is active |

### `cache.backend`
#### Description
Specifies the type of caching backend to be used.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| backend | string | Set to "redis" to use Redis as the caching backend |

### `cache.ttl`
#### Description
Defines the default Time-To-Live for cached items.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| ttl | duration | Set to 60 seconds (60s) in this configuration |

### `cache.redis`
#### Description
Contains detailed configuration for the Redis connection and behavior.

#### Internal Logic
Specifies various Redis-specific settings such as host, port, security, connection pooling, and timeouts.

### `cache.redis.host`
#### Description
The hostname or IP address of the Redis server.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| host | string | Set to "localhost" in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.port`
#### Description
The port number on which the Redis server is listening.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| port | integer | Set to 6378 in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.require_tls`
#### Description
A boolean flag to enforce TLS (Transport Layer Security) for the Redis connection.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| require_tls | boolean | Set to true, requiring a secure TLS connection |

### `cache.redis.db`
#### Description
The Redis database number to use.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| db | integer | Set to 1 in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.password`
#### Description
The password for authenticating with the Redis server.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| password | string | Set to "s3cr3t!" in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.pool_size`
#### Description
The maximum number of connections in the Redis connection pool.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| pool_size | integer | Set to 50 in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.min_idle_conn`
#### Description
The minimum number of idle connections to maintain in the pool.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| min_idle_conn | integer | Set to 2 in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.conn_max_idle_time`
#### Description
The maximum amount of time a connection can be idle before being closed.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| conn_max_idle_time | duration | Set to 10 minutes (10m) in this configuration |

### `cache.redis.net_timeout`
#### Description
The timeout for network operations with Redis.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| net_timeout | duration | Set to 500 milliseconds (500ms) in this configuration |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| cache.enabled | boolean | true | Enables the caching system |
| cache.backend | string | "redis" | Specifies Redis as the caching backend |
| cache.ttl | duration | 60s | Default Time-To-Live for cached items |
| cache.redis.host | string | "localhost" | Redis server hostname or IP |
| cache.redis.port | integer | 6378 | Redis server port |
| cache.redis.require_tls | boolean | true | Enforces TLS for Redis connection |
| cache.redis.db | integer | 1 | Redis database number |
| cache.redis.password | string | "s3cr3t!" | Redis authentication password |
| cache.redis.pool_size | integer | 50 | Maximum Redis connection pool size |
| cache.redis.min_idle_conn | integer | 2 | Minimum idle connections in pool |
| cache.redis.conn_max_idle_time | duration | 10m | Maximum idle time for connections |
| cache.redis.net_timeout | duration | 500ms | Timeout for Redis network operations |

This configuration file sets up a Redis-based caching system with specific connection parameters, security settings, and performance optimizations. It's designed to provide a secure (TLS-enabled) and efficient caching solution with connection pooling and timeout management.
